description:
Utako is the owner and original bartender of the bar Little Song. She blackmails http://anidb.net/ch93276 [Hitomi] into working for her after Hitomi becomes highly skilled at bartending, but is soon made redundant in her own bar as her customers come to prefer Hitomi`s drinks. http://anidb.net/ch93277 [Nitta] was romantically interested in Utako, but she rejects him because she believes him to be a divorced single father, and Nitta later loses interest in her due to her self-centered personality.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Utako
